title: Ghost & Gumshoe
description: You can't die twice.But you can get your living friends killed.Dolly Mott, the flapper's ghost who haunts the old speakeasy under private detective James Keeley's office, died in a gangland shootout in the 1920s.Or so James always thought.Now it looks like there's a lot more to Dolly's death than James ever realized, and not all of Dolly's past is dead and buried. Someone's determined to shake James off the scent, or put him six feet under.If he's not careful, he just might end up a ghost himself...
author: Layla Lawlor
